title: Endo Bondholders Press Opioid Maker Not to File for Bankruptcy
sub_head: Junior creditors argue that Endo has enough cash to avoid filing for chapter 11 in the near term
body:
Endo International PLC junior bondholders have formed a group to press the drugmaker not to file for bankruptcy as it faces opioid-related lawsuits and a drop in earnings.
The group of institutional investors said on Monday that it has proposed several out-of-court transactions, including a bond swap, that would enable Endo to continue operating its business and investing in new drugs.
